properties.areaDesc: Evangeline, LA; Avoyelles, LA; St. Landry, LA
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 2 at 3:11PM CST until January 2 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a

* Flood Advisory for...
Southeastern Evangeline Parish in central Louisiana...
Southern Avoyelles Parish in central Louisiana...
Northwestern St. Landry Parish in central Louisiana...

* Until 615 PM CST.

* At 310 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to
thunderstorms. This will cause minor flooding in the advisory area.
Three to Five inches of rain have fallen over the past few hours.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Eunice, Ville Platte, Marksville, Bunkie, Mamou, Moreauville,
Bordelonville, Morrow, Cottonport, Mansura, Hessmer, Chataignier,
Evergreen, Plaucheville, Goudeau, Indian Lake, Savoy, Duralde,
Whiteville and Big Cane.

Additional rainfall of two to four inches is expected over the area.
This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
properties.instruction:
A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding
of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
